subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierece missed a long step-back shot with 15 seconds on the clock that would have tied the game as the Nets, looking more scrappy than smooth, fell to the Cavaliers.
snippet: Paul Pierece missed a long step-back shot with 15 seconds on the clock that would have tied the game as the Nets, looking more scrappy than smooth, fell to the Cavaliers.
